title: The Fully ordained meat pie
creator_credit: Gillian Coote, Janet Bell and Film Australia
brief_description: This documentary looks at the attitude of the Church towards the ordination of women as priests, and follows a group of women lobbying for the right to be ordained into the Anglican priesthood. Featured in the program are Dr. Patricia Brennan, the Reverend Alison Cheek and Sister Angela of Stroud.
